channel.title: On a topic not revolving botting
channel.description:
[img]http://img219.imageshack.us/img219/1839/summoningf2prc8.png[/img]
Was "stumbling" across older Runescape pictures and manage to find a sentence from a Jmod revolving summoning. What do you think happened?

item.title: On a topic not revolving botting
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:23, topic:420166”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=522724.msg3808643#msg3808643 date=1320708054]

Dayum! Why don’t we have #200± (not RSC) servers!

I have a 194 server somewhere on my hdd.

Edit: Noting that it really isn’t that exciting.

aren’t you all missing a huge chunk of the original cache data?

Tough topic. I have some landscape files apparently from the beta, but they wouldn’t load correctly. I just need a complete cache, but that’s not exactly easy to find.
[/quote]
I’ve seen a 194 cache, a lot actually :O[/quote]whut

Read full topic
item.source: On a topic not revolving botting

I miss back in 01. When my older brother was typing for me and I was 3 Nostalgia

item.title: On a topic not revolving botting
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:4, topic:420166”]I’m just looking at old runescape… the graphics… the players… good times…[/quote]Yeah I felt something inside too when I saw this screenshot. RS today is a fairy-tale like game.

Their first decision was probably making it f2p but changed their minds.

Read full topic
item.source: On a topic not revolving botting

item.title: On a topic not revolving botting
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

That gameframe looks amazing. The toolbar above the client is amazing. The graphics are amazing (imo).
They probably took it away after making all of that shit and realizing they could make more money by adding a new P2P skill. Then the greed takes it’s position with the botting situation and all that other fun shit and it made Jagex some money.

Read full topic
item.source: On a topic not revolving botting

item.title: On a topic not revolving botting
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:10, topic:420166”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=522724.msg3802195#msg3802195 date=1320111333]
Summoning was ftp for the first week, the only creatures they could make were the first few, most items that were required to make pouches were p2p. So basically it would be like RuneCrafting, the lower level stuff is free to do, but nats and stuff are p2p. It was taken out for ftp when people thought it was a coo to try to get them to buy members.
[/quote]Andrew why you make stuff up :([/quote]
I didn’t, the quest didn’t come out till it was made members fully. I remember trying out summoning in ftp but being outraged at the prices of the materials needed to do it.

Read full topic
item.source: On a topic not revolving botting

item.title: On a topic not revolving botting
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:10, topic:420166”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=522724.msg3802195#msg3802195 date=1320111333]
Summoning was ftp for the first week, the only creatures they could make were the first few, most items that were required to make pouches were p2p. So basically it would be like RuneCrafting, the lower level stuff is free to do, but nats and stuff are p2p. It was taken out for ftp when people thought it was a coo to try to get them to buy members.
[/quote]Andrew why you make stuff up :([/quote]
That’s a lie haha, I wanted to do it when it came out and I was F2P. Had to become a member for summoning.

Read full topic

item.title: On a topic not revolving botting
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

I think they were going to make it in rsc, but something about the game engine not being able to handle it, and the charms of that time were life runes, its in the game code or something but not actually in the game…

RuneScape Wiki

Life rune

The Life rune is an item used in the Gower Quest. It is obtained by flipping the pure essence found in a crate on Gower farm. It is needed to turn the Brassican amulet into the Cabbagespeak amulet. Life runes cannot be created using the Runecrafting...

There it is

Read full topic

item.title: On a topic not revolving botting
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

Summoning was ftp for the first week, the only creatures they could make were the first few, most items that were required to make pouches were p2p. So basically it would be like RuneCrafting, the lower level stuff is free to do, but nats and stuff are p2p. It was taken out for ftp when people thought it was a coo to try to get them to buy members.

Can’t do Summoning without starting the quest, which is P2P. It was never F2P.

Read full topic
